title: Ticket #2314: allow transfer_output_remaps to work on directory names
description:
Expected behavior: If my job creates and populates a directory called "foo", I should be able to ask Condor to transfer it and its contents back, renaming them as it does so. Something like: 

  transfer_output_files=foo
  transfer_output_remap=foo=differentname

Actual behavior: Condor cannot apply a transfer_output_remap to a directory, only individual files.
